name: convert-to-inferred

schema.description: Convert existing Eslint project(s) using `@nx/eslint:lint` executor to use `@nx/eslint/plugin`. Defaults to migrating all projects. Pass '--project' to migrate only one target.
schema.title: Convert Eslint project from executor to plugin

project.description: The project to convert from using the `@nx/eslint:lint` executor to use `@nx/eslint/plugin`.

skipFormat.description: Whether to format files at the end of the migration.

description: Convert existing ESLint project(s) using `@nx/eslint:lint` executor to use `@nx/eslint/plugin`.
